page.title: 07FARM ACCOMMODATION, ALLET.
page.content: Mr.& Mrs.G's farmhouse has required major repairs,& a large extension was built, originally to house the aunt & mother of Mrs.G.. 6 rooms are now available for bed & breakfast tourists & the farm is registered to take up to 5 non-permanent caravans. None of this is advertised but is popular by recommendation & is available & used all the year round. Mrs.G. has no help & as well as working on the farm,bakes bread & makes wine.She still cares for her aunt & visits her mother in Truro. Plans to extend the tourist accommodation by converting unused buildings have been rejected by the local authority, as have plans for a large caravan site, although it is hoped that a few more caravans will soon be allowed under recent E.E.C. regulations.
